reviews.title: The DE Academy has been a wonderful‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
The DE Academy has been a wonderful experience. I love how you can move at your own pace. This really helps to grasp the material. All the instructors and coaches do a great job of making sure you're coming along and know how to use the tools available in the academy.
I've been in it for almost 4 months, and have experienced every emotion. My coach Yash Kantharia reassured me that this is normal and to keep grinding.

reviews.title: The conselors have been consistantly‚Ä¶
reviews.text: The conselors have been consistantly helping to student get on the right path.

reviews.title: Great Modules and supportive team
reviews.text:
Though I had joined a while ago, I had other things going on which made it difficult to work on DE modules everyday. But DE had a great & supportive team, who encourage and keep you on track. Big shout out to Stefan Lojanicic who despite working graveyard shift was able to accommodate my requests and is patient & kind to listen to my concerns and queries.
Also, Azmat, Kareem and Ninad are very knowledgeable in their field and take the time in answering all your technical questions.
Lets go DE academy !!!!

reviews.title: Data Engineer is a very hands on‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Data Engineer is a very hands on teaching based group that can land you in dream roles. I signed up about a month ago and so far so great. It is worth the investment, definitely not a waste of time and money.

reviews.title: I would say the best coaches you can‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I would say the best coaches you can have 10 out of 10 stay on top . And they help you learn and get the job done faster to make sure you know how to do it

reviews.title: DEA is magic
reviews.text: It's been a month, and the Data Engineer Academy has been incredibly helpful in my preparation. Their course content is excellent, especially the SQL questions, which have given me the confidence to tackle any coding round. Additionally, my success manager Yash has been guiding me throughout the course, providing valuable support. I feel highly confident that once I enter the job market, I can crack an interview on my very first attempt.

reviews.title: Gold Premium Coaching
reviews.text:
The Course offers a clear path to move forward and is flexible in its approach. While I am still progressing through the course, I feel that there is help available when I need it and I have confidence that I will reach my goal as long as I stick to it.

My coach Yash Kantharia was very helpful; offering me useful advice during our calls and being available on my schedule.

reviews.title: Data Engineering
reviews.text: Thank you, @Stefan Lojanicic! I was feeling really discouraged with my data engineering course at the @Data Engineering Academy, but your encouragement inspired me to get back on track and accelerate my career.

reviews.title: I have been a .NET C# developer since‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I have been a .NET C# developer since 2005 and I was finding that my career was slipping due to lack of experience in Data Engineering and AI. I am a Software Engineer contractor and my contract was about to expire and I was having trouble finding a new Contract or full-time position. SInce I started at the Data Engineering Academy they have helped me clean up my resume and target the Data Engineering skills I was having trouble with. I wasn't getting any responses when I placed my old resume on the internet but the changes we made have turned that around. The Data Engineering Academy has also helped me with my Data Engineering skills. My resume is getting noticed and I have had several interviews with two companies moving into the third interview phase. These are full-time positions not Contracts! It has gone from no response to dozens of calls a day. The last time I looked for a position was 7 years ago. At the time I could land a contract position in a couple of days. I found the job market has changed. If you don't have a polished resume and the skills that are in demand right now you will struggle finding a new position. DE Academy has helped me with every area that I needed improvement. I can actually say the DE academy has saved my career.

reviews.title: Worst expirience
reviews.text:
I enrolled in this program paying $8K, expecting personalized assistance with applications but ended up being required to take classes. These classes were poorly structured, and the online group meetings were uninspiring. Scheduling one-on-one sessions could take anywhere from a week to a month, which is inefficient.

Compared to other educational experiences I've had, which were more affordable and better designed, this program has been a letdown. With the added interest on loans, I find myself paying $12K for a service that has not met my expectations.

It's nearly a year since I joined, and despite multiple requests for a partial refund at the three and six-month marks‚Äîwhich were all denied‚ÄîI haven't progressed from where I started. I am still jobless after all this time and money invested.

My recent one-on-one for an assessment test was disappointing. I hoped for guidance on how to leverage my experience for the role I'm interested in, but instead, I received basic advice on how to use tools like ChatGPT or DeepSeek‚Äîsomething I could manage on my own without such a hefty fee.

Overall, my experience with this company has been highly unsatisfactory. I caution others against making a similar investment.

reviews.title: It's been two weeks since I started ‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
It's been two weeks since I started with Data Engineering Academy, and to be honest, everything so far has been amazing! From the very beginning, I had a gut feeling that this program would help me break into the job market, and that feeling is still going strong.

One of the standout aspects of Data Engineering Academy is the financial flexibility they offer. Their various payment plans make it much easier for students, especially international students like me, who might be on a loan or have limited funds to invest. They truly support you in every way possible, and I personally received excellent guidance in navigating these options.

Beyond finances, the mentorship here has been incredible. My mentor has been extremely motivating and supportive, guiding me through resume preparation and coursework. I have learned so much under his mentorship, and I continue to grow every day. While I can‚Äôt say for sure when I‚Äôll land a job, the knowledge and confidence I‚Äôm gaining make me feel optimistic that success is just around the corner.

Regardless of what you've studied before‚Äîwhether in your Master‚Äôs or Bachelor's degree‚Äîthis course provides a fresh start. Even if you have zero prior experience, Data Engineering Academy equips you with the right skills to kickstart your career. I‚Äôm truly grateful for this journey, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enter the data engineering field!

reviews.title: Five Star Experience!
reviews.text:
Between the Slack channel, Skool community, and check-ins with my Success Manager, I firmly believe that I've got the tools and support network necessary to get me to my goal!

This is way better in terms of organization than trying to learn data skills via endless YouTube videos and cheap Coursera courses.

reviews.title: DEA helpful experience‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Data Engineer Academy has provided a valuable learning experience. The structured syllabus and timeline were particularly helpful in keeping me on track. While free resources are abundant, the Academy's accountability and direction from their team have been crucial in ensuring I focus on immediately beneficial skills. This structure has significantly enhanced my learning journey.

reviews.title: My experience with Data Engineering after the first month or so.
reviews.text:
My experience with Data Engineering Academy so far is really great. It‚Äôs because it‚Äôs really exciting that various types of data can be manipulated with Select Query Language (SQL), which is a programming that relates to Databases. Also the instructors and staff members of the Academy do a really fantastic job of communicating with me about the my progress with the curriculum. Also they‚Äôre very open to helping me gain a clear understanding the the learning material.

I‚Äôm right about at the point where I‚Äôm finishing up with the SQL course and beginning with Python.

I‚Äôm looking forward to learning more about the concepts of Data Engineering with the DE Academy. I‚Äôm also excited to see where it will potentially lead me to in the near future.

Update 10 minutes after writing initial review:

Before joining DE Academy, my goals were to eventually work in software development. It‚Äôs because I felt as if it would be really great to work in a field that involves making computers communicate with the world around them. I didn‚Äôt have any doubts or challenges about learning data engineering. It‚Äôs because I‚Äôve been exposed to Database and SQL (Select Query Language) before. I found it fascinating that it‚Äôs an extremely useful method of deriving detailed information from spreadsheets.

I enjoyed the program in that the instruction in SQL is very involved. I‚Äôm taught various ways to derive info from databases in order to fine-tune specific information that is helpful to various corporations.

The instructors are very helpful; they provide a variety of different job aids for helping to master the material.

Since joining, I‚Äôm steadily improving as far as knowing how to derive specific types of information with SQL. I‚Äôm also just now learning the basics of Python, which is a programming language that‚Äôs useful for various applications, one of them being data engineering.

I‚Äôd recommend checking into the DE Academy to see if it would be a good fit. For a person who loves learning about technology, if nothing else, it would expose a person to various aspects of the data engineering field. This would help the individual to decide which path he or she would like to take forward in life.

Updated the above on March 13, 2025

reviews.title: DEA experience
reviews.text: Just had my first mock interview with Stefan. Went by way better than expected - in a way expected to be told: passed or failed, but got something much better. Stefan gave me a detailed review, what I did well, what I need to work on and made sure to schedule a follow up. DEA gives you all the tools for you to succeed, great program!

reviews.title: Payal‚Äôs teaching style is engaging
reviews.text:
Payal‚Äôs teaching style is engaging, interactive, and highly practical. She doesn‚Äôt just focus on theory‚Äîshe ensures that her students gain hands-on experience with ETL pipelines, data modeling, cloud technologies, machine learning, deep learning, and big data frameworks.

What truly sets Payal apart is her patience, enthusiasm, and dedication to student success. She fosters an environment where questions are encouraged, challenges are embraced, and learning is continuous. Her real-world insights and case studies bring data engineering to life, making complex concepts much easier to grasp.

In addition to technical training, Payal also provided invaluable guidance in behavioral interview preparation. She helped me refine my storytelling skills, structure STAR-based responses, and confidently navigate cross-functional collaboration, problem-solving, and leadership-related interview questions. Her mentorship significantly improved my ability to articulate my experiences effectively, ensuring I was well-prepared for both technical and behavioral interviews.
If you‚Äôre looking for a highly knowledgeable, inspiring, and results-driven coach in Data Engineering Academy, I highly recommend Payal Dehhia. Her mentorship has been invaluable, and I am truly grateful for the technical skills, strategic thinking, and interview confidence she has helped me develop.

reviews.title: It‚Äôs great place to enhance your‚Ä¶
reviews.text: It‚Äôs great place to enhance your practical skills , and real time projects etc. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: I've been working with DR Academy for 2 weeks‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I've been working with DR Academy for 2 weeks and I'm already feeling more confident in my future. My Contact Manager Osaki has been very helpful in reviewing resumes and answers to behavior questions. I'm looking forward to progressing through the training and exercises to find a job quickly.

reviews.title: Starting with Data Engineer Academy
reviews.text: Since I started I have found that communication is better here with Data Engineer Academy. They have a group channel to communicate with and weekly meetings on different technologies. I am hoping that my journey here will bring me many rewards in my job search.

reviews.title: The course is very well rounded
reviews.text: The course is very well rounded, and they allow you to go at your own pace. They get that life happens, and help adjust your timeline as needed. They all have great training materials, and help you in ways that I wasn't expecting, like very hands on prep sessions. You're not just learning about data analytics and data engineering, you're learning how and preparing to get a job in the actual field.

reviews.title: Highly recommended to anyone wanting to land in a Data Job.
reviews.text:
I joined as a student and am still undergoing training, but I feel incredibly fortunate that the universe led me to Chris's YouTube Ad where he explains how to master data skills through DE Academy's mentorship program.

From my very first call, I've been impressed with everything about the experience. The materials are exceptionally well-organized, eliminating any guesswork. The program is structured with clear discipline‚Äîsetting proper expectations, accounting for my baseline skills, and providing personalized gap analysis that shows exactly where I need to focus to succeed.

Thank you! I'll share another update when I cross my finish line. I have absolutely no doubt I'll have countless more kudos to give to Chris and his amazing team!

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.text: I've been with DE Academy for about 1-2 months. I'm coming from a healthcare background and am extremely new to coding. I like that there are steps that help guide and teach you what you need to know. There is a lot of support and resources which is helpful when you know little to nothing. They also provide a lot of support outside of coding itself: interviews, resumes, etc. Everyone is very friendly and excited for you to learn. I'd say my experience is generally positive & you will learn something. I feel at times that it almost assumes you know how to do some of the more advanced steps without teaching you. If you don't like hour long videos of someone just showing code without pictures or diagrams, this is not for you.

reviews.title: New to data, but doing it with DEA
reviews.text: I'm just starting out in data with Data Engineer Academy, and Stefan is my Customer Success Manager. He seems like a nice guy who is intent on helping me be successful, so that makes me happy. I look forward to getting work in the industry thanks to Stefan's efforts. Fingers crossed.

reviews.title: Great team of mentors and professionals
reviews.text: Great team of mentors and professionals and they understand and work with you every step of the way; no matter what situation you are in.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text: Great. Hands on success managers help and encourage students to succeed. They understand student weaknesses and help them navigate through their doubts increasing success opportunities.

reviews.title: Great community
reviews.text:
Great community. This is an investment in yourself.
You have to put in the work but it is worth it at the end. The success team and coaches are helpful and give yiiu great advice and feedback.

reviews.title: Excellent project based real world‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Excellent project based real world training, which gives you a opportunity to prepare you for real world problems. Definitely will recommend.

reviews.title: Great community and you get what you‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Great community and you get what you put in. It requires work, if you‚Äôre a lazy exec that writes a 1 star review because you‚Äôre complaining about money then maybe it‚Äôs not for you because this is ultimately an investment in yourself. The success team and coaches are helpful and great I recommend if you want to not go to school and get yourself in a winning position.

reviews.title: Career Shift - Moving Forward
reviews.text:
I am a software engineer who is changing career paths. While I have been exposed to much of the topics covered through the Data Engineer Academy (DEA), the course performs more of a deep dive into each, focusing on the key components required to become a data engineer. I am about 5 weeks into the program and I am being challenged every step of the way. The material is not easy, but I'm seasoned enough to know that learning comes in the midst of pain, so I'm pushing through the content at full speed.

It's encouraging to have people who are actually in the field as mentors. While a predominance of the material is self-paced, there are regular checkpoints and milestones to reach to keep you on track. There are also regular group breakout sessions to discuss specific topics and answer questions.

And if I'm completely honest, I had to really weigh the cost of the program with the expected outcome to determine if the expense was merited. After much research and multiple conversations with DEA representatives, I determined this was an investment in myself and my career.

I am fully confident that this program will provide me with the skills I need to jump in to the data engineering field. I'll update my review in a few months to see if everything is still meeting my expectations.

reviews.title: What truly sets this academy apart is‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
What truly sets this academy apart is the community and network. Being surrounded by like-minded individuals, mentors, and industry professionals creates an environment that not only accelerates learning but also boosts your confidence in securing a job. The support system here is unparalleled, making the entire experience incredibly valuable.

If you‚Äôre on the fence about joining, think of it this way: landing your next job is like closing a sales deal, and your investment in this program is just a small commission (5-10%) paid upfront for that life-changing opportunity. The knowledge, skills, and connections you gain here will pay off significantly in the long run.

reviews.title: Transformative Experience at the DE Academy
reviews.text:
Such a great curriculum, well-structured, covering essential topics for aspiring data engineers. The instructors are knowledgeable, providing valuable real-world insights in a more personalized setting than traditional university education.

I am currently working on my Data Science Master's Degree, and with the DE Academy, I feel prepared to secure the right job faster, even before I graduate. The hands-on projects reinforced my learning, and the collaborative community expanded my network. The academy focuses on current tools and technologies, ensuring that students are well-prepared for the job market.

I highly recommend the Data Engineering Academy for anyone looking to enhance their skills in data engineering!

reviews.title: Great place to access knowledge and get‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Great place to access knowledge and get the data role of your dreams!

reviews.title: Data Engineer Academy provides high‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Data Engineer Academy provides high quality courses, mentoring and job search assistance. They are determined to help you succeed in your career goals.

reviews.title: My experience at Data Engineer Academy‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
My experience at Data Engineer Academy (DE Academy) has been beyond exceptional. The instructors and success coaches are truly invested in your education. They make personalized adjustments as needed per student.

DE Academy's small class sizes have enabled me to gain confidence in my learning abilities. The instructors are available if you need help with your course work, which can include difficult coding exercises, mock interviews, and solid, professional job prep exercises ‚Äì all of which are crucial to learn and master for success. Instructors and Success Coaches will take the time to help students who may or may not be struggling with the more difficult concepts, taking the time to explain them to the student so that there is a complete understanding. That time with your success coaches is unbelievably valuable to you as a student.

The curriculum is centered around the student and what that student wants to achieve. DE Academy offers vast experience with interactive classes that allow you to ask questions of the instructors and get solutions in real time. Instructors take the time to explain ‚Äúwhy‚Äù and ‚Äúhow‚Äù the data is used, and ‚Äúwhere‚Äù it can be best utilized.

Success coaches at DE Academy are incredibly dedicated and genuinely care about each student's individual needs, fostering a supportive learning environment where students feel encouraged to reach their full potential. The courses are straightforward, engaging, and noticeably clear in helping students gain the technical knowledge to be successful.

I now feel more confident in my abilities in the data world and would highly suggest DE Academy to others who are wanting to try something different and learn new skills to become the best you can be.
The interactive format at DE Academy facilitates learning. The facilitators (instructors) provide valuable feedback to help students fully understand the value of what they are doing, and I felt motivated to continue my education.

I highly recommend the great people at DE Academy and the quality learning environment the academy offers!!!

reviews.title: Very knowledgeable and helpful
reviews.text: The staff at Data Engineer Academy helped me prepare for interviews and get an offer. Grateful for their help.

reviews.title: My Wonderful experience with The Data Engineering Academy !!
reviews.text: I‚Äôve been learning each day with the Data Engineering Academy & I must admit, this has been the most important step for me to get a start in Data & I took a leap to join this course & it is worth it completely. I appreciate the help from my mentors guiding me through this. One of them is Om, he is one of the tutors who is helping me build a framework for learning this curriculum & was very helpful from the beginning. The information I‚Äôm getting here is really useful towards helping me understand Data & this course is always assisting me with becoming better in this field. I‚Äôm able to join the calls weekly & just listen to the ways in which all of these programs operate together. This course is quickly becoming the go-to foundation for someone new to grow into a Data Analytics position & work their way toward a career path where they can work as a Data Engineer one day. I‚Äôm glad to be taking this course, & it‚Äôs been the best eye opening experience for me, so I‚Äôm really excited to be able to learn about the wide world of Data Engineering & Data Science !!

reviews.title: Highly recommend if you are wanting to transition into the tech field.
reviews.text: The DE Academy program significantly helped me transition from conventional engineering to the tech space. Their material and videos are highly focused, teaching exactly what‚Äôs needed without wasting time on unnecessary deep dives. I highly recommend this course for anyone transitioning into tech.

reviews.title: Worth the investment!
reviews.text: You have to fully commit your time to this, but if you do, a few short months of effort will lead to a complete shift in career opportunities in tech and data. Well worth it.

reviews.title: First month in the program
reviews.text:
Just started the program and there are lots of resources to guide you through the steps to become a suitable applicant for Data Engineering Jobs with a formulated plan specific to where you are at. It will require hard work on your end so I don't recommend if you are not truly committed. But then again, nothing worth doing comes easy right?

Being able to have support from an entire team of DE practicioners is invaluable in itself, let alone have them guide you! Highly recommend instead of trying different courses hoping for results.

reviews.title: I had a great experience with Data‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I had a great experience with Data Engineering Academy, and it was truly a pleasure to be part of the team. My counselor, Ms. Payal Dedhia, along with the entire team, was incredibly supportive, cooperative, and always ready to help at every step of the journey. Their guidance made learning seamless and enjoyable. I highly recommend this academy to anyone looking to gain practical knowledge and hands-on experience in data engineering.

reviews.title: Very inclusive course
reviews.text: Lots of info to cover, hitting most every major topic in data engineering. Lots of helpful feedback and additional group classes to help you with difficult topics. I still have a long way to go and haven't used all the benefits that come with the course, but looking forward to them.

reviews.title: Great platform
reviews.text: Great platform, great group calls, instructors are very knowledgeable.

reviews.title: A Cutting-Edge Learning Experience for‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
A Cutting-Edge Learning Experience for Future Data Engineers!

I started the Data Engineering Academy in January with zero experience in SQL and Python, and I can‚Äôt believe how much I‚Äôve grown in just a few months! The program is structured perfectly for beginners like me and those looking to advance their skills, with easily accessible lessons, workshops and pre-recorded coaching lessons that make learning both engaging and effective.

One of the standout features is the weekly SQL coaching and check-ins with my success coach, ensuring I stay on track and truly understand each concept. The unlimited support and resources available have made the learning curve much smoother than I ever expected.

If you‚Äôre looking for a program that provides real-world skills, expert guidance, and a supportive learning environment, this is it! Highly recommend to anyone serious about breaking into data engineering.

reviews.title: I had a smooth onboarding experience!
reviews.text: I had a smooth onboarding experience where I was given a personalized plan and a team of coaches to lean on! I feel confident on making small consistent next steps to transition into a Data role!

reviews.title: Great coaching!
reviews.text: The personalized coaching really helped me to overcome some of the more challenging stages of the program!

reviews.title: The training that I am going through‚Ä¶
reviews.text: The training that I am going through Data Engineer Academy is really great as it covers all aspects like Python, SQL, Data Modeling, AWS and Snowflakes.

reviews.title: Great Training Program
reviews.text: DE Academy focuses on developing the necessary skills for your carrier goal. I would recommend to join Data Academy if someone is serious to take their profession as a Data Engineer.

reviews.title: Guided Training makes life easy
reviews.text: I have a trainer who is just as compassionate and understanding as he is knowledgeable. The way he explains things puts complex code and analysis into a very simple perspective. I have quite a bit of experience with these technologies, still I learn so much each time we speak.

reviews.title: I enrolled in DE Academy to begin my‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I enrolled in DE Academy to begin my journey for a career change. So far it has been very organized and well structured. There are many coaches available to help and my success coach is great!

reviews.title: Great Job Application Support
reviews.text:
I am really grateful for the support that I got from the team. Shout out to Payal, Stefan, Milada, Pooja, Siddesh, Ninad and Chris. They really do care about you and helping you to be successful in your career.

They did a great job polishing me resume, helping me identify a company and role that I love, and supporting me through the interview process. This was definitely the highlight of the program for me; I would definitely recommend their job application feature.

reviews.title: Data Engineer Academy - A Transitional Force
reviews.text: I recall seeing Data Engineer Academy ad some time last year I saw it again around the Holidays. I had taken previous bootcamps and was hesitant to try another on. DE Academy is nothing like a bootcamp. I think their approach is really unique. They really tailor to your needs. I think its equally important to know how to move around in an interview as it is to know the applications for your job. Coming from Cyber Security this is eye opening. You have tons of support here. Whether it is though Slack, Documented methods, or Live sessions. Your advisors are always around to nudge you in the correct direction. That's a welcome change. I am looking forward to the next couple of months as I continue my Data Engineering Journey.

reviews.title: complete course
reviews.text: I enrolled in the Data Engineer Academy two months ago. It's a well-structured course designed to help individuals transition from non-coding roles effectively. The program is self-paced and includes a timeline feature that allows me to track my progress and achieve my goals.

reviews.title: DE Academy Success Managers
reviews.text: I would like to give a shout out to the Success Managers at DE Academy. I was set up with a game plan based on current knowledge and ability to take control of my future. In the early going was over the holidays I had reservations about wanting to continue and lost the passion for this type of study. Speaking with multiple Success coaches they listened to my concerns and frustrations, and to be honest my ranting, but through all the despair, anxiety we were able to settle and meet on level ground. I know we scaled back my learning stilling allowing me to advance my skills but more at my pace minus the 1-on-1, but it is something I am ok with as I may after taking a break can come back with in a more positive mental state to finish. I really want to say thank you to Yash, Milada and others for listening, understanding and helping me through this time. DE Academy is a game changer!!

reviews.title: Incredible way to upskill (and earn more) in your career
reviews.text: The skills and tutorials are up to date, I got a lot of 1:1 help, the community has tutors with various deep specialization, and the tutoring platform is comprehensice. I really enjoyed the focused daily calls for problems and projects, the career services department is robust and responsive (far more than any college), and pretty much every thing they prepped me for I was ready for the interview. I would definitely recommend the investment.

reviews.title: Positive Experience
reviews.text: Doing the program right now, and I have improved SQL immensely in a short amount of time. The content is very good and there is good support from the coaches.

reviews.title: DE Academy Experience
reviews.text:
I recently had the opportunity to enroll in De Academy Coaching, and I must say it has been an outstanding learning experience. This coaching institute offers a well-structured curriculum that is perfect for both beginners and professionals looking to upskill.
One of the highlights of De Academy Coaching is its emphasis on hands-on practice. Students are encouraged to work on real-time projects and assignments that simulate industry scenarios. This not only helps reinforce theoretical concepts but also boosts confidence in implementing them in real-world situations.

reviews.title: Learned SQL
reviews.text: I started in data analytics and was having a struggle with learning SQL. This helped me a lot and made the whole process easy to learn!

reviews.title: Top-Tier Advising and Interview Prep for Data job
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience working with the team. They are highly knowledgeable and experienced in their field, providing tremendous support during my job search. The highlight of the program was the advisor who closely guided me through my journey. Additionally, the mock interviews were exceptional, boosting my confidence for real interviews.

reviews.title: DE Academy Experience
reviews.text: Very good experience. DE Academy focuses on developing the necessary skills for Data Engineering and helps by keeping you accountable to it. Would recommend if someone wants to seriously gain DE knowledge and ultimately land a job.

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: Very good! I learned AWS, Python, SQL, Data Modeling, and System Design well. Job application search is great! I landed interviews at good companies!

reviews.title: From Zero to Data Engineer
reviews.text: After getting laid off from my previous job (non-tech) I came across DEA. I came with zero coding and a little bit of Excel experience, but I had developed an interest in data. Coming from a non-tech background and already in my mid-career looking to transition, I knew I needed specialized guidance since the odds were against me. Yes, DEA's tuition was expensive, which required an extensive discussion from my partner, but ultimately the tailored 1:1 mentorship and the support with my applications made it a no-brainer since it would help me offload a significant amount of time and emotional fluctuations. The course platform and my mentors taught me SQL and Python from scratch, as well as other tools such as AWS products and dbt. It also offered a plethora of tangible projects (where my mentor helped with debugging and understanding its use in the real-world), library of tutorials (including LeetCode-type questions for SQL, Python, and Pandas). Fortunately I was able to study full-time and within 6 months from enrollment, I got an offer as a Data Engineer at a startup. The program continues to develop with more lesson modules, community forums, group classes, etc. things they didn't have yet when I first joined - so I continue to study with them to help me prepare for more competitive roles and quickly grow my career in this field.

reviews.title: DE Academy Is the Best in Its Genre
reviews.text:
DE Academy is a place where learning is made easy. Courses are broken down to the most digestible portion possible. As we age, our brains tend to struggle with new knowledge acquisition. DE Academy thought about that, and has really made it accessible and affordable for most working professionals. I particularly like their training plans, techniques. A totally different approach with training fees tailored to meet detailed needs. I do enjoy for the first time my SQL class which has been divided in 3 successive and consecutive parts, allowing even newbies (new beginner) to start with SQL training on a safe foot.

Keep it up DE Academy!

reviews.title: DE Academy Review
reviews.text: I have been with this organization for about 2 months and the program have been a great experience. The team at DE Academy delivers on what they say they will do and assist you with. A game plan is set from the beginning with ample support and resources at your fingertips along the way. The rest is up to you!

reviews.title: DE Academy is Life Changing
reviews.text:
As a Diamond client of DE Academy, I have received a lot of context around my career trajectory and having the support of so many mentors including the CEO has been very illuminating. I am so impressed by their level of commitment and strategy to keep students focused and interview-ready for data-oriented roles. Even though I only spent less than 2 months in the program, I am super stoked towards the next steps and receiving impactful mentorship, opportunities, and a life-changing experience to put my current situation to bed and look towards a much brighter future with clarity in my trajectory.

The content within the platform is also really solid. I've certainly been able to leverage the content to do my day job work more efficiently while also being able to strategically prepare for various interviews in a short time frame.

I believe Data Engineer Academy is going to reach the stars and truly train the next generation of data engineers, AI engineers, and anyone working adjacent to engineering-focused data roles to really succeed in the ever-evolving job climate with rapid demands and technological change.

reviews.title: Start Your Data Journey Here !!
reviews.text: Where should I start ? This program is one of the most amazing experiences I have ever had the pleasure to be apart of. I‚Äôm starting to love the wide world of Data because of this Academy. The hands on experience combined with the real world scenarios they offer make students feel as if they are Senior Level Data Professionals from the start. If you are new to this field, start this program & take time to really immerse yourself into this process, & you don‚Äôt have to worry because from the beginning they will encourage you to push through this with helpful advisors who really work to help make it possible to learn. Diana K. worked with me for weeks to get me enrolled & she kept being confident in me to go ahead & start this process with ease. I‚Äôm so glad to have enrolled & I feel like this will be the start to so many other successful endeavors that I will undertake. So should you decide to start your journey here, just know that you can feel comfortable with your decision as others have started right here as well !! Good Job, Chris Garzon !!

reviews.title: You Can‚Äôt Go wrong By Joining Data Engineering Academy
reviews.text: Data Engineering Academy is simply the best centre of learning. Definitely one of the best decisions ive made. The curriculum was comprehensive, covering everything from foundational SQL principles to advanced cloud technologies like AWS. The instructors are industry professionals , ever ready to help you, give you insights and valuable career advice. I sure can‚Äôt thank the data engineering team enough for their help. They are simply amazing.

reviews.title: DE Academy is the best school or program for you!
reviews.text:
DE Academy is the probably one of the best schools worth spending time to learn and gain skills that will help you scale up in your career. They have a unique way of helping you achieve your goals with a dedicated plan tailored for you in whatever situation that may seem difficult or challenging for you to learn which really encouraged me to take the next step with the program. The staff is amazing! Down to earth, very understanding, knowledgeable in everything tech related NOT just data engineering but other roles as well, and patient which allows anyone to stay focus while they hold your hand along the way. They‚Äôre responsive and always ready to help when you need it! If your in the fence about joining I suggest at least jump on a call with there advisers to help you make a decision which they will not pressure you to make u less you feel like the program is the right fit for you. Can‚Äôt thank the DE team enough for helping me every step of the way!

Cheers,

reviews.title: Great platform and community!
reviews.text: DEA has been great! They truly partner with you in your learning and preparation for your next step in your career. There is always someone you can reach out to for all of your questions and a great community to provide you support along the way.

reviews.title: DE Academy is by far one of the best‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
DE Academy is by far one of the best coaching courses I have ever experienced. It combines strategies that cater to different learning styles and individual needs. What sets it apart is their commitment to customizing personalized plans tailored to your career journey.

They guide you step by step until you achieve your goals, which I truly appreciate. Their dedication and passion for helping others succeed are evident in everything they do. You can tell they genuinely care about your growth and ultimate success.

reviews.title: I like that courses are self-paced‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I like that courses are self-paced allowing learners to complete lessons on their schedule and providing clarifications in the weekly meetings. This flexibility is very ideal for working professionals or students. Assignments and discussion forums keep the learning process engaging.

reviews.title: Great program
reviews.text: The coaches are there to guide you every step of the way and the program has great resources and materials. Everyone is given a chance to clear up confusion in the weekly meetings.

reviews.title: Exceptional Support for Career Growth in Data Engineering
reviews.text: As someone with a programming background, I was looking for a program that could help me sharpen my data engineering skills and take them to the next level. The Data Academy delivered exactly that. The mentors are knowledgeable, approachable, and deeply committed to your success. The curriculum is streamlined yet flexible, allowing me to build on my existing skills while learning industry-specific techniques. Their guidance has been invaluable in preparing me for interviews and advancing my career. I highly recommend this academy to anyone looking to enhance their expertise and grow professionally.

reviews.title: This academy is one of a kind
reviews.text: This academy is one of a kind. I am still in the process but I must say I am genuinely surprised by the level of commitment they put in to get you to become a success story. Stefan and Chuks are definitely great mentors and I am excited to work with them. Very soon, I know I will become another success story.

The DEA instructors have been patient and resourceful throughout this process. I look forward to working with them throughout this career transition.

reviews.title: DE Academy is Great
reviews.text: DE Academy is well thought out and offers a success coach to keep you on track. Great materials and motivational help. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: DE Academy consistently guides us.
reviews.text: DE A has been helpful each step of the way towards my goal of becoming computer literate. Highly recommend you check them out.

reviews.title: Streamlined yet personalized
reviews.text: Streamlined yet personalized experience to garner optimal yet self-paced curriculum to tackle interviews. It was great experience working with dedicated team of people silo'd to help you come up on each end of pillar to make sure you make the best attempt at interviews.

reviews.title: DE Academy Turned My Career Path to Data Engineering.
reviews.text:
I am very thankful to DE Academy for helping me grow my profession from full-stack developer to data engineer. The educational structure, teaching methods, and mentorship/1-1coachings offered here are unique.

The mentors provided data engineering techniques like pipeline development, database optimization, and flexible architecture design. Group meetings and Q&A sessions to enhance the areas where we are having difficulties.

What actually sets DE Academy was the effective planning and structure. From the start, I had a clear plan for what I would learn, and each lesson built on previous ones. Their hands-on projects allowed me to apply my knowledge in real-world situations, increasing my confidence and ability in this fresh field.

Thanks to DE Academy, I not only got technical knowledge but also developed the mindset of a data engineer.

reviews.title: As someone who is very skeptical of‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
As someone who is very skeptical of these online programs, including the various screening calls‚Ä¶ Chris‚Äô program was 100% worth it. I was stressed about the price, but my offer will pay for it in one paycheck‚Ä¶!!

I was part way through a few interviews when I decided to join and immediately plugged into a community that work RELENTLESSLY to help you build confidence in your Data Engineering ability and land a job.

I‚Äôve been a DE for 4 years, but wasn‚Äôt sure how my skills applied to other DE roles in industry. The gap method helped me learn what‚Äôs out there in industry instead of struggling for weeks hoping the job I get an interview for is applicable‚Ä¶ If you take the program seriously, take notes on the videos, and try hard during the mock interviews it is worth every penny.

In tech, there is no road map to navigate a successful career. This replaces the black box that is job requirements and the abyss of Reddit advice.

reviews.title: I am not buying these services!
reviews.text:
I am not buying these services!

As another user mentioned, I got a first call where they asked me a lot of questions, only to schedule another call with the salesperson. Then I got on the sales call with another fellow, who started with the usual: "If this is not the program for you, we will part ways." Why are all coaches and mentors using this strategy lately? It's plain wrong.

Anyhow, a LOT of more questions came my way, only to say that I did qualify for their Personalized Training. Since I am a seasoned corp-exec with 20+ years of experience, he told me that I could become a member of their Diamond Program, for an unreasonably high amount of money.

Although I should have ended the call at that point, I kept on listening to try to understand what could cost that much money. That's when he started talking about the gap method and showed me how it's implemented and more. In other words, exactly the same process that an entry-level aspiring data scientist would get!

He also mentioned that I would have the full engagement of the founder in my case and a guaranteed job offer.

When I asked if I could talk to other C-suite clients enrolled in the Diamond Program, the answer was, "Sorry, but we don't usually do that." This triggered all the alarms.

A company selling training packages that is not willing to let their premium customers talk to each other, and share experiences, clearly is not worth the time or the money. Especially not that amount of money!!

reviews.title: Mary was extremely helpful and very‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Mary was extremely helpful and very professional patient with a novice

reviews.title: The best decision I‚Äôve made for my career.
reviews.text:
Joining Data Engineer Academy has been a life-changing step in my journey to becoming a Data Engineer, and I can‚Äôt recommend it enough.

The Gap Method isn‚Äôt just a teaching technique‚Äîit‚Äôs a transformative approach that bridges the gap between where you are now and where you want to be in your career. My success coach, Chucks, has been an exceptional mentor, guiding me through the challenges of SQL and ensuring I stay motivated and focused.

This program is unique in its personalized approach; it‚Äôs not just another set of modules but a tailored experience that adapts to your pace and goals. The support from the DEA team is phenomenal‚Äîthey‚Äôre genuinely invested in your success and always available to provide insightful feedback or advice.

As someone in the early stages of learning SQL, I‚Äôve already made significant progress, and my confidence in securing a future job is growing every day. What sets DEA apart is their dedication to practical learning, with hands-on training that prepares you for real-world challenges in data engineering.

If you‚Äôre serious about breaking into data engineering, this program is a no-brainer‚ÄîI can confidently say it‚Äôs the best decision I‚Äôve made for my career.

reviews.title: I was excited about the concept...
reviews.text:
I was excited about the concept of the Data Engineering Academy, but unfortunately, the execution left much to be desired. The course material was extremely weak, often outdated, incomplete, or even inaccurate. Instead of engaging, skill-building projects, the assignments felt more like basic "paint-by-numbers" tasks, offering little opportunity for real growth. Collaboration and team-building exercises were almost nonexistent, which is a huge missed opportunity for a program of this nature.

The program demands a significant time commitment‚Äîequivalent to a second job‚Äîbut the support structure doesn‚Äôt justify this level of effort. Many instructors are in vastly different time zones, making it nearly impossible to schedule meetings. Even when meetings do happen, some instructors lack interpersonal skills and can come across as snippy or rude.

On top of that, communication relies on the free version of Slack, which was a red flag from the start. When the free trial expires, you have to jump through hoops to maintain access to the instructors. A more robust and accessible platform like Discord would have been a much better choice.

Given the cost of the program, I expected a much higher return on investment. Unfortunately, the course fell short. For the same price, you could gain far more value by pursuing certifications, books, or other resources that provide comprehensive and up-to-date material. While the concept of the academy is promising, its poor execution makes it difficult to recommend.

reviews.title: The gap method is the best
reviews.text:
Ever since I join the program, Chris and his team has done nothing else but contribute to pursue a data carrer and to land a good job.
At the beginning was skeptical based on tons of bootcamps and learning modules that exists. This one goes beyond that, the gap method is what differentiate them from the rest. This program is NOT another website that you click on modules and lear but it is a individual program and a group of people that help on your learning experience.
I totally recommend the program.

reviews.title: My journey to become DE
reviews.text: A few months ago, I had the privilege of joining this team, but due to my course load, I couldn't complete the task at that time. However, my counselor, Mr. Chucks, and the rest of the team were incredibly supportive and cooperative throughout. Now, with positive vibes and renewed determination, I am confident that I will soon begin the interview process and ultimately land my dream job. This experience has reaffirmed my belief that this is the perfect path for me on my journey to becoming a Data Engineer.

reviews.title: As someone with no prior experience in‚Ä¶
reviews.text:
As someone with no prior experience in IT, I can honestly say it wasn't easy from side to fully grasp the course outline Initially, I was apprehensive and unsure if I could keep up, i nearly quit. However, the program's structure and the support from the team made all the difference.

When I hit a major roadblock and felt like giving up, Chris and my coach Stefan went above and beyond to help me. They re-personalized my course to better suit my learning style and level of understanding. Stefan, in particular, was incredibly dedicated. He took extra time to break down complex Python concepts into simpler and also supplemented the lessons with additional resources from external sources, ensuring I had all the tools I needed to succeed.

The personalized attention and encouragement I received were pivotal in my learning journey. Thanks to their efforts, I not only overcame my initial struggles but also gained confidence in my ability to tackle IT challenges now im done with the python and im doing pandas. I highly recommend this bootcamp to anyone, especially those without a background in IT. Their commitment to student success is truly remarkable.

One more thing, Use the slack channel to communicate your challenges and struggles and if you new in the IT field, let the emphasizes be on that, so that they can tailor the course outline to fit you which might be different from those who already have a background in It!

reviews.title: I rarely leave reviews
reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews, but my experience with these people has been frustrating and disappointing. The process started with a 30-minute meeting just to share my background so they could schedule another call three days later. I rearranged my busy schedule to attend the call on time, only to wait 20 minutes and receive an invalid link. None of them answered my calls or followed up. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend wasting your time with them.

reviews.title: Amazing Practice and preparation schedule
reviews.text: The fact that you get to train and practice both SQL and Data Modeling with really good examples stood out for me. really good experience as an intermediate developer trying to upskill.

reviews.title: I just started and my experience with‚Ä¶
reviews.text: I just started and my experience with the team has been great. Not only I get all the access that I need but the team has always been available for help. I'm, confident that this is what I'm meant too doo for my journey to become DE.

reviews.title: Legit Program For Those Looking To Get Employed in Data Engineering
reviews.text: I think Chris and his team have put together great service. This is a serious program. The value is in their ability to get your technical and interviewing skills to a place where you can reliably get interviews and be successful. Albeit, you have to work hard to meet their standards. The mock interviews and the job application services are worth the entire price tag in my opinion. If you're serious about transitioning to Data Engineering, Chris and his team will get you that job! I highly recommend the Data Engineer Academy.

reviews.title: Challenge yourself to raise your career aspirations
reviews.text: If you have a passion for data engineering and a thirst for learning, then the Data Engineering Academy is the right place for you. When I joined this academy, I was already an accomplished data engineer. After attending some of their learning sessions I quickly realized Chris and his mentors are authorities in their professions. Their goal is to develop well rounded professionals. They challenged me to think and speak concisely to the point and be willing to commit to polishing both my technical and non-technical skills necessary to raise my career aspirations. Most importantly, don‚Äôt be afraid to ask questions. The best solutions are derived by asking questions! I highly recommend you give Data Engineering Academy a try.

I recently graduated from college with a degree in engineering, and I wanted to pivot into a data analyst/engineering role. The website is extremely easy to navigate, and the team has done an amazing job in preparing you in both soft and technical skills. reviews.text: I like DEA for the personal coaching on behavioral questions, technical interviews. They provide provide useful tips and advice on variety of DE topics. And the most important of all is that there is great help in reviewing your resume and doing the job applications for you.

reviews.title: Outstanding value and professional guidance
reviews.text: Chris and his team have developed an amazing program. The resources and one-on-one professional experience have been on point and tailored to your goals and objectives. After years of certification and boot camps, I can see the value and highly recommend it to current and future IT professionals.

reviews.title: Excellent communication
reviews.text: Excellent communication. Great company to work with.

reviews.title: Shoutout to DE Academy for being my journey's co-pilot! üåü
reviews.text: I started with them around September 2024, I see I have improved a lot in technical skills and more importantly the one on one session with the coaches helped me a lot. I know I have a long way to go in such short time but I am trying my best. The thing that makes them different from others is their personalized plan and one on one sessions.

reviews.title: Data Engineer Academy provides‚Ä¶
reviews.text: Data Engineer Academy provides exceptional mentorship and support you until you actually land that Job. If you need to get high quality skills to get a job a top-notch companies, then trust them and let them guide you toward this journey.

reviews.title: From Novice to Expert: My Transformative Journey at Data Engineer Academy
reviews.text:
Joining the Data Engineer Academy has been a transformative experience for me. Before enrolling, I struggled to find a comprehensive, end-to-end data engineering course. But the DE Academy had just what I needed, offering a curriculum that takes students from scratch to mastery.

The coaches here are incredibly skilled and experienced, delivering well-thought-out lectures across all sections. In just 1.5 months, I've seen a significant shift in my approach to data engineering, thanks to the real-world examples in SQL and data modeling. These projects have truly changed the way I think about and handle difficult data problems.

One of the standout aspects of DE Academy is their emphasis on real-world examples and practice. Everyone looks for hands-on experience to master this role, and DE Academy has designed their course with a strong focus on real-world problems. I found that 95% of my time was spent working with real-world scenarios, rather than just focusing on theoretical concepts.

The one-on-one mentorship has been exceptional, providing personalized guidance and support every step of the way. The customer service is also top-notch.

I'm grateful for the hands-on experience and the knowledge I've gained so far. The DE Academy has exceeded my expectations, and I can't wait to see what the rest of the course has in store!

reviews.title: Analysis of the DE Academy's Coaching Service
reviews.text:
I am so excited to share my experience with DE Academy's coaching service! As someone treading the turbulent waters of today's job market, I can confidently say that their support and guidance have been nothing short of invaluable. From the personal assessment that kicked off the coaching process, I could tell that my coach‚Äîand the program as a whole‚Äîwas fully invested in my success. The assessment was spot-on, providing a solid understanding of my skills and abilities and, more importantly, helping me figure out what I really want to do‚Äîas well as what I don't want to do.

The resources that DE Academy provides are of the highest quality. I have been immersing myself in the curriculum, which spans the range of data engineering topics, including SQL and Python. With the kind of deep-dive practice that their materials enable, I have no doubt that I will be proficient in these tools by the time I really need to use them. I've also been making use of their Q&A sessions, where I've received some really solid advice and clarity on certain topics. Another feature of their service that I regard as outstanding is the mock interviews. I mean, who doesn't love a good confidence boost?

Moreover, they have a very meticulous process in place when it comes to reviewing resumes. I was quite impressed with how they took my resume and helped me turn it into something better‚Äîsomething that really highlights my strengths. I am now part of the "Apply for Me" program, which is probably the best thing that's ever happened to me. These people are applying to jobs on my behalf. That saves me so much time! And they're negotiating for me as well, which is great since I am pretty terrible at that.

In every way, DE Academy has gone above and beyond my expectations, and I sincerely appreciate their commitment and knowledge. For anyone seeking a thorough coaching service that genuinely has your best interests in mind and really wants you to prosper, I can't recommend DE Academy enough. The coaches there have the experience and know-how to help you navigate your journey. I‚Äôm excited to see what‚Äôs next for me and know they‚Äôve set me up well for whatever outcome is in store.

reviews.title: Reliable and Timely Support
reviews.text: Not the kind of support I expected from them.

They are super supportive, help you choose the right learning path, and you have help all along the way. This was the best choice for me trying to break into a new field.

reviews.title: Great Program
reviews.text: I joined this data engineering program in mid-May, and I am incredibly grateful for the experience. The course is well-structured, the team is highly responsive, and the weekly check-ins have been invaluable in keeping me on track. A special thank you to Chucks, who not only provided positive guidance but also offered support during some personal, challenging times. The 1-on-1 mock sessions delivered immediate, constructive feedback, helping me refine my focus. I am very pleased with the Academy and only wish I had started sooner. I'm excited to continue working with Stefan and look forward to the next phase‚Äîon to the application process!

reviews.title: Great !
reviews.text: I had to leave my course at DE Academy midway due to unexpected personal circumstances, and the team was incredibly understanding and supportive throughout the process. They worked with me to find an amicable solution, which I really appreciated. Their professionalism and empathy in handling the situation stood out, and even though I couldn't complete the program, I‚Äôm grateful for their flexibility. The resources I accessed were top-notch, and I would recommend DE Academy for anyone looking to further their skills in data engineering.

reviews.title: Zero to Hero in 5 Months
reviews.text:
So I come from a cybersecurity background and was having difficulty getting a job in cybersecurity. I had taken on some boot camps but didn‚Äôt have any guidance on how to approach interviews or even write a competitive resume. I thought long and hard about what next steps to take and lo-and-behold, I got a referral from an acquaintance who‚Äôs wife joined DE and had a job in just a few months. I thought to myself no way and felt it was too good to be true but was going through tough times so decided to lookup DE Academy online to find out for myself. I watched some interesting testimonials from some DE academy alumni and that boosted my confidence even more because they spoke about how DE supports you throughout the bootcamp and even after during the job application face.
Fast forward, on 8th May 2024 I joined DE academy to study to become a full time data engineer. Just yesterday I got hired for a senior data engineering role which pays over $180k yearly and I‚Äôm just overfilled with joy.
This was possible because of the assistance I had from the DE Academy coaches in building a resume to fit my background, working on behavioral questions for interviews and working on real-life data engineering projects to equip me with the necessary skills to prepare me for the job market. The frequent check-ins with the Customer Success Manager (Chucks) also encouraged me in areas where I was having difficulty and reached out to coaches on areas where they needed to help me get better.
The journey was not an easy one but with strength from God and dedication I was able to achieve what I doubted to be possible.
Big shoutout to Azmat, Nikola, Milada, Ninad and Chris for all the help in building me to become an expert in Data Engineering.
I encourage everyone to join DE academy as I believe they are the best in equipping you with the necessary tools to be job ready in Data Engineering and Data Analyst respectively.
Also, challenge yourselves to put in extra work when working on the personalized plan created for you when you join DE. There might be times when you hit roadblocks especially if you are a beginner in the field, but taking advantage of the slack channels to reach out to the coaches and also joining the Q&A sessions will answer most of the questions you have. Personal research using sources like ChatGPT and YouTube are also highly encouraged.
I wish everyone who plans to join DE Academy the best and wish they land their dream roles as I believe it‚Äôs very very very possible.

Big thanks to Chucks for being super helpful with any roadblocks or challenges along the way. The entire team is always responsive and ready to assist whenever needed.

reviews.text: The organization and attention to helping me as a student succeed is pretty clear. The only thing holding me back from moving forward at a faster pace is myself, and I'm getting help with that myself.
